column5: My daughter is looking into buying something to put on for swimming, she asked if I knew anybody that used them & I said I post it on here to see what people have to say, do you or your family members use any of the UV clothing from any company & what do you think about it, any info would be appreciated<br style="font-family: Verdana; font-size: 10px; text-align: left; "> Thanx & Tight Lines SBK

Rash guards are great,  they do work, and are pretty stylish.  My wife just picked up an Oakley one and loves it.  We have been using them for quite a few yrs, since our trip to Hawaii.....  Not sure how old your daughter is and I do not want to be presumptious, but Dakine makes one with built in support You should be able to source some through various surf shops or online retailers.
